description.narrative: By the end of 2020, the capacity and systems of the MEN, at central and different decentralized levels to plan, manage and train are strengthened in order to improve governance, to install notions of accountability in the education system and to optimize its results for the benefit of schools and children., which contributes to Early Learning, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2020, more girls and boys are enrolled, retained and learning in pre-primary and primary schools, and there are fewer children out of school.

sector.narrative: Education sector planning including coordinating role, SDG 4, etc.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By the end of 2020, the capacity and systems of the MEN, at central and different decentralized levels to plan, manage and train are strengthened in order to improve governance, to install notions of accountability in the education system and to optimize its results for the benefit of schools and children.

description.narrative: Activities have been implemented as planned. The efficiency of implementation could improve. One of the main inefficiencies is the high rotation of national staff, particularly after changes in the central government. Turnover reduced the impact of capacity-building activities that target specific programmes or offices. It also hinders the leadership of MENETP to promote and pilot new approaches. One of UNICEF's most powerful contributions has been its leadership and coordination role in different partnerships of international technical and financial partners working with Madagascar's government. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Availability of the Education Sector Plan (2018-2022)
